title.narrative: STRATEGIC POSITIONING

description.narrative: Positioning UNICEF's voice, reach and public engagement progressively increase and brand perceptions are strengthened to position UNICEF as the leading expert, advocate and actor for children in Thailand and across the world, which contributes to Adolescent Empowerment, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development, Cross-Sectoral Communication For Development (Covid), Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Country Programme is efficiently designed, coordinated, managed and supported to meet quality programming standards in achieving results for children

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Positioning UNICEF's voice, reach and public engagement progressively increase and brand perceptions are strengthened to position UNICEF as the leading expert, advocate and actor for children in Thailand and across the world

description.narrative: UNICEF Thailand has mobilized an unprecedented number of celebrity and influencer supporters who joined various advocacy, communication and fundraising initiatives throughout the year. Those who rallied to support our cause and campaigns were not only celebrities and entertainment influencers, but also included prominent and active Thai young people who are striving to bring about positive change in their communities. This collaboration has contributed to create large-scale media coverage across various traditional and online platforms, helping to amplify child rights content and messaging on social media, as well as lending support to fundraising efforts by engaging the wider public. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:31/12/2019

actual.value: 2020:Advocacy is made to advance the rights of the most vulnerable children to change policy.
